Class MoviePass

java.lang.Object
Ticket
MoviePass
public class MoviePass
extends Ticket
The first movie is $9.99 (includes tax) and all additional movies are free if: 1. Attend only one movie per day 2. movie cannot have been seen before. 3. Movie cannot be IMAX or 3D. If any of the 3 rules have not been met, they will be charged at the Adult Price.
Author:
Herman Mann

  • Constructor Details

    • MoviePass

      public MoviePass​(java.lang.String movieName, java.lang.String rating, int day, int time, java.lang.String format, int id, int numVisits, int numOfMoviesSeenThatDay, int numberofTimesSeenthatMovie)
      Parameters:
      movieName - the name of the movie.
      rating - the rating of movie.
      day - the day of the movie.
      time - the time of the movie.
      format - the format of the movie(3D or IMAX or NONE).
      id - the employee ID.
      numVisits - the number of visits by the employee.
      numOfMoviesSeenThatDay - number of the movies seen that specific day.
      numberofTimesSeenthatMovie - the number of times seen that specific movie.

    • MoviePass

      public MoviePass​(java.lang.String movieName, java.lang.String rating, int d, int t, java.lang.String f, int id, boolean ifFree, boolean oneMovie)
      Parameters:
      movieName - name of movie.
      rating - of movie
      d - the day of movie
      t - the time of movie.
      f - the format of movie.
      id - the employee id of employee
      ifFree - if the movie is free, these certain conditions will follow as mentioned.
      oneMovie - the price of seeing the movie the first time is $9.99.
